author: Aditi Shah
title: Indian airline IndiGo expects domestic travel recovery by Oct-Dec quarter - Reuters India
description: IndiGo, India's biggest airline, expects domestic air travel to recover by its October-December quarter, the company's CEO said on Monday, and has started to see a pick up in passenger numbers despite a resurgence in COVID-19 infections in the country.

author: Neel Kamal
title: Five-fold rise in farmer protests in India since 2017, says CSE’s new statistical analysis
description: Farmer protests in India have almost a five-fold increase since 2017. Just a year before the target doubling of farmers' income, India recorded 165 major protests across 22 States and UTs in 2020 up from only 34 major protests witnessed in 15 states in 2017.
